oai_dc:dc.dc:title: It’s kite time in Nashville, 1940
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A captioned photo from the Nashville Times (1940), about “these Nashville youngsters are air-minded, and the March wind can’t get too strong for them. In the picture, made in Elmington Park yesterday afternoon are Carolyn Mae Norman, daughter of Mr. and Mrs. Jack Norman; Sarah Orr, daughter of Mr. and Mrs. Eugene Orr, and Tommy Banks. “ Forms part of the Nashville Times newspaper collection. 1 digital photo.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Norman, Jack; Orr, Eugene; Banks, Tommy
